A C E M S T 

A

api - package api
 

C

client - package client
 
Client - Class in client
This class represents an RMI client that can execute tasks on a remote computer.
Client() - Constructor for class client.Client
 
Computer - Interface in api
This is the remote interface through which different tasks can be submitted and executed.

E

EuclideanTspTask - Class in tasks
This class solves a Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP), where the cities are points in the 2D Euclidean plane.
EuclideanTspTask(double[][]) - Constructor for class tasks.EuclideanTspTask
Instantiates a new Euclidean TSP task.
execute(Task<T>) - Method in interface api.Computer
A remote method to which different tasks can be submitted by the remote clients.
execute() - Method in interface api.Task
Executes a given task.
execute() - Method in class tasks.EuclideanTspTask
Executes the Euclidean TSP Task.
execute() - Method in class tasks.MandelbrotSetTask
This method uses a simple algorithm for drawing a picture of the Mandelbrot set.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class client.Client
The main method.
main(String[]) - Static method in class tasks.EuclideanTspTask
The main method.
main(String[]) - Static method in class tasks.MandelbrotSetTask
The main method.
MandelbrotSetTask - Class in tasks
This class helps to produce a visualization of the some part of the Mandelbrot set which is probably one of the most well known fractals, and probably one of the most widely implemented fractal in fractal plotting programs.
MandelbrotSetTask(double[], double, int, int) - Constructor for class tasks.MandelbrotSetTask
Instantiates a new Mandelbrot set task.

S

SERVICE_NAME - Static variable in interface api.Computer
The name under which the RMI registry binds the remote reference.

T

Task<T> - Interface in api
This defines the interface between the Computer implementation and the work that it needs to do, providing the way to start the work.
